fields.name: Rent:
fields.value: $20X where X is the number of Capsule Properties held by the Owner.

fields.name: Stop-in Effects:
fields.value:
Depends on the number of Capsule Properties held by the owner.
1. You lose one non-Property item at random.
2. You lose half of your non-Property items at random, rounded up.
3. You lose all of your non-Property items, and at random, one of your Properties becomes unowned.
